description:
cgo, goyacc, go/build, html, http, path, path/filepath, testing/quick, test: use rune

Nothing terribly interesting here.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Fixed.  That was the only 'rune rune' I could find
in the tree except for struct fields.

Russ

http://codereview.appspot.com/5300043/diff/5001/src/pkg/http/cgi/host.go
File src/pkg/http/cgi/host.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5300043/diff/5001/src/pkg/http/cgi/host.go#newcode336
src/pkg/http/cgi/host.go:336: func upperCaseAndUnderscore(rune rune) rune {
s/rune rune/r rune/ maybe?

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5300043/diff/5001/src/pkg/go/build/dir.go
File src/pkg/go/build/dir.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5300043/diff/5001/src/pkg/go/build/dir.go#newcode467
src/pkg/go/build/dir.go:467: quote := rune(0)
perhaps rune('\x00')

(perhaps eventually then the rune conversion can be eliminated)

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b4a4f2a9d3f3 ***

cgo, goyacc, go/build, html, http, path, path/filepath, testing/quick, test: use rune

Nothing terribly interesting here.
